name: Chanel Coco Mademoiselle
description: Bright citrus opening with bergamot and orange leads into a floral heart of rose and jasmine. The base is warm with patchouli, vanilla, and musk. Best suited for elegant daytime occasions and formal gatherings.

name: Dior J'adore
description: A luminous floral blend of pear, melon, freesia and magnolia with a heart of jasmine and rose, grounded by soft musk and vanilla. Ideal for romantic evenings, spring & summer wear.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium
description: Edgy and bold — coffee, pink pepper, and orange blossom upfront; jasmine and almond in the heart; vanilla, patchouli and cedar in the base. Best for nighttime wear, colder seasons, and statement looks.

name: Gucci Bloom
description: A lush floral garden: notes of jasmine, tuberose, and Rangoon Creeper combine to create a full-bodied white-floral scent. Perfect for spring, daytime wear, and garden events.

name: Lancome La Vie Est Belle
description: Sweet and luminous — iris, praline and black currant open the scent; jasmine and orange blossom in the heart; patchouli and vanilla base. Great for evening wear, date nights, and festive occasions.

name: Marc Jacobs Daisy
description: Fresh, youthful and playful — wild strawberry, violet leaves and ruby red grapefruit open; gardenia and violet heart; soft woods and musk base. Ideal for casual daytime wear and spring/summer outings.

name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
description: Opulent, dark and mysterious — truffle, black currant and ylang-ylang open; orchid and dark florals in the heart; patchouli, incense, chocolate in the base. Best for evening, formal events, and colder weather.

name: Viktor & Rolf Flowerbomb
description: Explosive floral bouquet — top notes of bergamot and tea; heart of jasmine, rose, orchid, freesia; base of patchouli and praline. Perfect for romantic occasions, evening wear, and date nights.

name: Jo Malone Peony & Blush Suede
description: Delicate floral elegance — red apple top note, heart of peony, rose, jasmine and carnation; suede base. Best for day wear, spring-summer, and feminine looks.

name: Jimmy Choo Fever
description: Fruity and warm — top notes of plum, litchi and grapefruit; heart of heliotrope, vanilla orchid, jasmine; base of tonka bean, vanilla, benzoin, coffee. Great for evening, night out, or autumn-winter wear.
